DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the non-inferiority of Z-213 compared to Saccharated Ferric Oxide using the maximum change in Hb from baseline over 12 weeks in patients with Iron-deficiency Anemia (IDA)
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study of Intravenous Iron Preparation to Iron Deficiency Anemia
DOC.criteria: Patients with iron deficiency anemia Patients with anemia caused by conditions other than iron deficiency Patients with abnormal laboratory test values at screening for Serum phosphorus, Aspartate aminotransferase, Alanine aminotransferase Patients with liver, kidney or circulatory system disease Patients with a history or present illness that is a malignant tumor or autoimmune disease Patients who underwent intravenous administration of an iron preparation, administration of an erythropoiesis stimulation agent or blood transfusion within 8 weeks before the screening Patients who underwent oral administration of an iron preparation (including an overthecounter drug or supplement) within 4 weeks before the screening
